articles.title: Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine May Cause Alarming Delayed Side Effect, Doctors Say It's 'Normal' - International Business Times
articles.description: Some people who received their first shot of the Moderna vaccine suffered from red and swollen arms a week after inoculation.
articles.content:
KEY POINTS
  • Some patients who received the Moderna vaccine suffered from swollen arms
  • A skin biopsy of one of the patients indicated the condition was caused by a drug reaction
